title: OBSESSED With Fracking, Is Trump Winning? 10.26.20
itunes:title: OBSESSED With Fracking, Is Trump Winning? 10.26.20
description:
In episode 743, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and performer Bushra Burney to discuss the fracking debate, undecided voters, Peggy Noonan terrible and racist op-ed in the Wall Street Journal, armed men appearing polling sites, the Havana Syndrome, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump’s Fracking Fixation Is Not Landing in Pennsylvania
  2. Undecided voters in pollster focus group describe Trump as 'controlled' and Biden as 'vague' in debate
  3. A Good Debate, and It’s Not Quite Over
  4. Florida Deputies to Add Security After Armed Men Appear at Polling Site
  5. The Mystery of the Immaculate Concussion
  6. WATCH: Photay - Outré Lux (feat. Madison McFerrin) (Official Music Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
